lead_paragraph: Jessica Mendoza and Crystl Bustos hit back-to-back home runs to lift the United States to the gold medal with a 3-0 victory over Japan at the world championship in Beijing. The United States beat Australia, 5-1, earlier yesterday to reach the gold-medal game.
